title: From idea to production
description: Whether you are launching an innovative digital product or looking to improve, redesign, or scale an existing one, BearStudio is here to help!

metadata.title: French development studio for digital project founders
metadata.description: BearStudio supports project founders by providing technical assistance with the web or mobile development of their ideas.

contact.title: Tell us about your problem!
contact.description: You didn't end up here by chance, and you probably have a problem or context in which we can help.

idea.title: I have an idea but I don't know where to start
idea.quote: "I have the idea, the motivation, the beginnings of specifications... but I don't know what the next steps are."
idea.description: Come meet us directly at our offices in Normandy near Rouen, or give us a call. We'll take the time to discuss your project and the steps ahead. We're generous with advice and we're used to guiding project founders who are a bit lost.

need.title: I have a specific need for my project
need.quote: "I'm missing a skill internally or I need an outside perspective to keep moving forward."
need.description: Mockups, UX Design, development, audit or support: we can intervene at several stages of your project to help it evolve. Let's take the time to discuss your needs together, or send us an email with your request for a quick cost estimate.

experts.title: Our experts
experts.description: Meet the passionate bears who bring your digital projects to life with expertise and creativity.

blog.title: Our articles
blog.description: Discover our articles, feedback and thoughts on web and mobile development and digital best practices.

trust.title: They trust us
trust.description: Startups, SMBs, and large organizations trust us to design and develop their digital projects.

clients.cuisinezPourBebe: Cuisinez pour bébé helps parents prepare homemade meals for their baby, cultivating the joy of healthy and delicious eating.
clients.docaposte: Docaposte Agility supports businesses in their digital transformation with trusted digital solutions and agility services.
clients.kernelBiomedical: Kernel Biomedical designs innovative medical devices to improve patient diagnosis and treatment.
clients.leaEnglish: Léa English is a mobile app that helps learn English in a fun and interactive way.
clients.trashTalk: TrashTalk is the go-to media for basketball enthusiasts, with news, analysis and exclusive content about the NBA.
clients.campo: Campo is an ecosystem of mobile aviation products designed by pilots for pilots, crews, and aviation operators.

values.title: Supporting project founders
values.intro: On most websites, values are displayed to look "good"... But for us, it's truly important! We know it's cliché to say this, but we won't refrain from being sincere just because there's a lot of bullshit on other sites...

support.title: A support studio close to your ideas
support.description: Without trust, no initiative can succeed. That's why we work on a human scale and with complete transparency.

quality.title: Developments that prioritize quality
quality.description: Our goal is to provide you with an effective solution to test or conquer your market. We emphasize the quality of our support and development services to enable your project to succeed.

team.title: An agile and responsive team of developers
team.description: We REALLY apply agility. We listen to your needs and develop custom solutions tailored to your digital project. You'll be in constant contact with our developers to move forward efficiently on your needs.
team.location: Our studio is based in France, but wherever you are, if you want us to integrate with your team, we can travel anywhere in the world.

conviviality.title: Conviviality
conviviality.description: It's great to work at BearStudio: we form a complementary team that puts its good mood at the service of your projects!
